document.discussion_title: Anime/Manga - Preview: "Ajin" 2nd OAD Episode Focuses on Characters' Daily Life | HALLYU JPOP NATION
document.topic_text: ₩3,038,940 Following the eighth volume released in May of this year, the limited edition set of the next ninth volume of Gamon Sakurai's Ajin: Demi-Human sci-fi action manga series will also include a DVD containing a newly-produced anime episode. While the first OAD was based on the "File:00 Shinya Nakamura Incident" episode included in the manga's second tankobon volume, the second one will focus on the daily life of the main characters: Kei, Kou, Tosaki, and Shimomura at a ryokan (Japanese style hotel) that they are using as a hiding place, and Sato and Tanaka at their secret hideout. Both the limited and book-only regular edition will be available on October 7. Preview
